images.prompt: A raw, ultra-realistic 8k photograph of a stunningly beautiful young Japanese idol, exuding a fresh, innocent allure while shopping in the city. Captured from a low angle on a subway escalator, the perspective accentuates her long, slender legs clad under a beige, form-fitting trench coat. She dramatically pulls down dark sunglasses to lock eyes with the viewer, revealing a cute yet seductive expression under skin-perfect lighting. Despite the moody green color grade, vibrant neon signs from the station bathe her in bright, luminous hues, enhancing the silky texture of her straight black hair and flawless complexion. In a whimsical contrast, she clutches a soft blanket and pillows tightly against her chest, adding an intimate layer to the chic outfit. Shot on Sony A7R IV, 85mm f/1.4 GM lens, the depth of field renders the bustling station tunnel into a creamy bokeh, with ray tracing and global illumination emphasizing the realistic details.8k photo, Large breasts, deep cleavage, ample cleavage, sexy photo, beautilful girl without makeup
